name: Bunny Baby Bonanza
description:
Quick prototype for the GMTK 2022 Jam - Theme "Roll of the Dice".
Breed as many bunnies as you can, but the fate of your fluffy friends is decided by the dice. No victory conditions at the moment.

Controls:
- Click and drag bunnies into the pen and the dice will appear
- Click on the dice to roll and see how many bunnies will be born or taken away

Credits:
- Art by moodypixels ( https://twitter.com/moodypixels )
